resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81235</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81235</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4789</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Proof-reading and the Conventions of Language</string>
            <string language="es">Revisión de errores y las convenciones del idioma</string>
            <string language="ga">Profáil agus Gnásanna na Teanga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Proof-reading und die Vereinbarungen der Sprache</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Correction d'épreuves et les conventions du 
langage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Proof-reading e as convenções da língua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Correzione di bozze e le convenzioni del 
linguaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διόρθωση και οι Συνθήκες της γλώσσας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan that focuses on children learning to check their writing for mechanical errors after first observing the teacher model the procedures.</string>
            <string language="es">Plan de lección que se centra en que los niños aprendan a comprobar su escritura para encontrar errores mecánicos después de haber observado primero los procedimientos del modelo del profesor.</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean ceachta a dhíríonn ar leanaí ag foghlaim le seiceáil a gcuid scríbhneoireachta do bhotúin mheicniúla tar éis dóibh féachaint ar an múinteoir agus na nósanna imeachta á dhéanamh aige/aici.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Lektionplan, der Foki auf den Kindern 
erlernen, ihr Schreiben auf mechanische Fehler, nachdem er dieser ist 
zuerst den Lehrer, zu überprüfen beobachtet hat formen die 
Prozeduren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le plan de leçon ce des foyers sur des enfants 
apprenant à examiner leur écriture pour déceler les erreurs 
mécaniques après avoir d'abord observé le professeur modèlent les 
procédures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A planta da lição essa focos nas crianças que 
aprendem verificar sua escrita para ver se há erros mecânicos após 
primeiramente ter observado o professor modela os procedimentos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il programma di lezione quel fuochi sui bambini 
che imparano controllare la loro scrittura per vedere se ci sono 
errori meccanici dopo in primo luogo l'osservazione dell'insegnante 
modella le procedure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο μαθήματος που εστιάζει στα παιδιά που 
μαθαίνουν να ελέγχει το γράψιμό τους για τα μηχανικά σφάλματα 
μετά από πρώτα να παρατηρήσει το δάσκαλο διαμορφώνει τις 
διαδικασίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
